content: भोगवत् {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Giving pleasure or delight, delightful. {@--2@} Happy, prosperous. {@--3@} Having curves, ringed, coiled. {%--<ab>m.</ab>%} {@--1@} A snake. {@--2@} A mountain. {@--3@} Dancing, acting, and singing together. {%--<ab>f.</ab>%} (ती) {@--1@} An epithet of the Ganges of Pātāla or the lower world (पातालगंगा). {@--2@} A female snake-demon. {@--3@} <ab>N.</ab> of the city of the snake-demons in the lower world. {@--4@} The night of the second day of a lunar month.
